narrative:
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection.
This 2nd prelicense inspection for a Class C license and exit briefing were conducted with a facility representative.
The license fee should be sent to the following address:
USDA-APHIS Animal Care
Building B, Mailstop #3W11
2150 Centre Avenue
Fort Collins, CO 80526-8117
The pre-licensing process including fees processed must be completed within 90 days or the applicant will forfeit the
application fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. 
No regulated activity may be conducted until a valid USDA license is obtained.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
